Articles.Content:
Hello
Congratulations for the work done and the improvements to the game.
The last patch modified the handling of message windows which no longer disappear when the game is paused.
This is not practical when you want to do a screenshoot by hiding the interface. The message remains.
Hint:
1. Messages might disappear when paused
2. messages could be hidden with F2
THANKS
True, though there's a workaround. Pause, hit F2, switch to map, switch back, F2 again. Message gone.
